attributes.action: make wages for all to rise at the same rate as inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work for a private emloyer and although my wage rises are fairly substantial when they come along it can sometimes take two to three years.Effectively, after a few months, prices rise again and I'm back where I started, scrapeing through life to make the ends meet! Perhaps if the Managers and other top brass stop giving themselves astronomical bonuses, and passed it on to the employees, we might have a better financial situation for all!
